title: Calories in Potato Wedges
meta_description: Learn calories in wedges potato per 100g, with full nutrition facts, macros, fiber, sodium, and tweaks for baked vs. fried versions.
assumptions: Oven-baked potato wedges, skin-on, with 1 tsp oil per 100g, lightly salted; Idaho or russet potatoes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato type, oil amount, cooking method, and seasonings. Check labels or recipes for precision.

quick_answer.text: 100g of oven-baked potato wedges provides ~132 kcal, mainly from carbs with some added fat from oil.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

faqs.q: How many calories in wedges potato per 100g?
faqs.a: About 132 kcal for oven-baked potato wedges per 100g.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in potato wedges?
Are potato wedges high in fat?
faqs.a: 4.7g total fat per 100g when baked with minimal oil; higher if fried.

faqs.q: Calories in wedges potato if air-fried?
faqs.a: Similar to baked, around 120-140 kcal per 100g with little to no oil.

faqs.q: How much sodium in potato wedges?
faqs.a: About 250mg per 100g if lightly salted; varies with seasonings.
